courseDescription:
This advanced C program language online course begins by teaching the concept and function of conditional flow statements and their mechanisms. You will learn how to implement simple IF statements before diving further into their use alongside logical operators. Next, you study the logical OR statements.

The material will teach you about goto statements and loops in C programming as well as blocks of code - and see why many consider the use of goto in C to be a bad practice. Next, you will be learning about the while loop in C, custom functions in the language, the concept of booleans and bitmasks as well as about changing data using bitmasks.

Finally, this free online course will teach you about data structures within C programming and displaying data in memory as binary. In this concise course, you will learn what you need to know, whether you want to develop a career as a programmer or simply expand your knowledge on this subject. Enroll in this course today and start learning about logic and statements in the C programming language.
